learning_objective: Modify, remix, or incorporate portions of an existing program into one's own work, to develop something new or add more advanced features.
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Alex is working on a project that addresses the issue of fair and affordable housing. They want to calculate the average housing price in their city and compare it with the median wage. They found a program that gives the median wage, but they need to modify it to also calculate the average house price. Which of the following modifications should Alex make?",
    "Answer1": "Add a loop to add all the prices and divide by the number of houses",
    "Answer2": "Change the code to output the maximum house price",
    "Answer3": "Remove the wage calculation part",
    "Answer4": "Modify the loop to subtract house prices instead of adding them",
    "CorrectAnswer": "1",
    "Explanation": "By adding all the prices of the houses and dividing by the total number of houses, we will get the average house price. This adds a new functionality to the program Alex found that fits their needs.",
    "code_snippet": "number totalWage = 0.0\nnumber wageCount = 0\nwhile hasNextNumber()\n    number wage = getNextNumber()\n    totalWage = totalWage + wage\n    wageCount = wageCount + 1\nend\nnumber medianWage = totalWage / wageCount\noutput medianWage"
}
